english: Do your work, but don't worry about the results.
explanation: Focus on doing your best in whatever you're doing, but don't stress about what happens next. This brings peace because you're not constantly worried about outcomes.

english: Yoga is skill in action.
explanation: Real yoga isn't just physical postures—it's performing every action with awareness, dedication, and spiritual consciousness. This transforms ordinary work into sacred practice.

sanskrit: मन्मना भव मद्भक्तो मद्याजी मां नमस्कुरु
english: Always think of Me, become My devotee, worship Me and offer your homage unto Me.
explanation: By keeping our mind focused on the Divine in all activities, we transform our entire life into a spiritual practice, finding peace in constant connection with God.

english: Abandon all varieties of religion and just surrender unto Me.
explanation: When we surrender our ego and personal desires to the Divine will, we find ultimate liberation from anxiety and discover true peace that surpasses understanding.

sanskrit: यदा यदा हि धर्मस्य ग्लानिर्भवति भारत
english: Whenever and wherever there is a decline in righteousness, I manifest Myself.
explanation: The Divine presence emerges in times of darkness and confusion. Even in our personal struggles, this divine consciousness can manifest to guide us toward light.

english: Just as we change old clothes for new ones, the soul changes old bodies for new ones.
explanation: We are not our physical body but the eternal soul within. Understanding this helps us overcome fear of death and accept life's changes with peace.

sanskrit: क्लैब्यं मा स्म गमः पार्थ नैतत्त्वय्युपपद्यते
english: Don't give up, Arjuna. This weakness doesn't suit you.
explanation: We all have inner strength and divine power within us. When we connect to this inner courage, we can face any challenge without fear or despair.

english: Lift yourself up by your own efforts. Don't put yourself down.
explanation: We are responsible for our own happiness and growth. By thinking positive thoughts and making good choices, we can lift ourselves from sadness to joy.

english: Stay balanced in both happiness and sadness, treating stone and gold the same.
explanation: True peace comes from staying calm whether good or bad things happen to us. When we don't get too excited or too upset, we find lasting happiness.

english: Work done for God frees you from worry.
explanation: When we do our work as an offering to the Divine instead of just for ourselves, it becomes a form of worship and frees us from stress.

english: Wise people don't grieve for the living or the dead.
explanation: Understanding that the soul is eternal helps us deal with loss and separation. The wise see beyond physical forms to the eternal spirit within.

sanskrit: नासतो विद्यते भावो नाभावो विद्यते सतः
english: What is real never stops existing. What is unreal never truly exists.
explanation: Our true spiritual nature is eternal and real, while our problems and worries are temporary. Knowing this brings lasting peace and strength.

english: When someone is happy with themselves alone, they have found true peace.
explanation: Real happiness comes from within, not from getting things or approval from others. When we're content with who we are, we find lasting joy.

english: When you keep thinking about something, you become attached to it.
explanation: Our thoughts create our reality. By watching what we think about, we can free ourselves from unwanted desires and find mental freedom.

english: Free from likes and dislikes, one can find peace.
explanation: When we stop being controlled by what we love and hate, we can handle any situation with calmness and wisdom.

english: Good qualities bring happiness and knowledge.
explanation: When we develop kindness, honesty, and purity, we naturally become happier and wiser. These good qualities light up our mind and heart.

english: It's better to do your own work imperfectly than someone else's work perfectly.
explanation: Being true to yourself brings more peace than trying to copy others. Follow your own path and purpose, even if it's not perfect.

english: The confused soul thinks 'I am the doer of everything.'
explanation: Ego makes us think we control everything, which creates stress. When we realize we're part of something bigger, we find freedom from this burden.

sanskrit: नियतं कुरु कर्म त्वं कर्म ज्यायो ह्यकर्मणः
english: Do your duties. Action is better than doing nothing.
explanation: Even small positive actions are better than sitting around worrying or being lazy. Taking good action, however small, leads to growth and peace.

sanskrit: यो मां पश्यति सर्वत्र सर्वं च मयि पश्यति
english: One who sees Me everywhere and sees everything in Me never loses Me.
explanation: When we see the Divine in all people and situations, our whole life becomes sacred and we always feel connected to God.

english: One who sees the same soul in everyone reaches the highest state.
explanation: When we see that everyone has the same divine spark within them, we naturally treat all people with love and respect, bringing us great peace.

english: Always do your work well but without attachment.
explanation: We can do excellent work while staying peaceful inside. Give your best effort but don't get stressed about the results.

english: Treat joy and sorrow, gain and loss, victory and defeat as the same.
explanation: When we don't get carried away by life's ups and downs, we stay centered and can make wise decisions in any situation.

english: To those who worship Me with pure love, I give them what they need.
explanation: When we focus our heart on the Divine with sincere love, our needs are naturally taken care of in perfect timing.

sanskrit: मामेवैष्यसि सत्यं ते प्रतिजाने प्रियोऽसि मे
english: You will come to Me. I promise you this because you are dear to Me.
explanation: God's love for each of us is personal and unconditional. This promise brings comfort that we are never alone and always loved.

english: Out of compassion, I destroy the darkness of ignorance with the light of knowledge.
explanation: Divine grace actively helps us understand truth and overcome confusion. Our sincere seeking invites this transforming wisdom into our lives.

english: No one who does good ever comes to harm.
explanation: Every kind act, however small, creates positive energy that protects and guides us. Good deeds always lead to good results eventually.

english: One who is happy with whatever comes naturally is free from jealousy.
explanation: When we stop forcing things to happen and trust life's flow, we find unexpected joy and freedom from comparing ourselves to others.

english: Free from expectations and possessiveness, act without worry.
explanation: When we let go of needing to own things or control outcomes, we can work with full energy while staying peaceful and relaxed.

english: One who sees God equally in all beings never harms themselves.
explanation: When we see the Divine in everyone, including ourselves, we naturally treat ourselves and others with love and respect.

english: A wise person goes beyond both good and bad actions.
explanation: Through spiritual wisdom, we transcend worrying about whether our actions are perfectly good or bad, and find freedom in divine grace.

english: Surrender to God completely. By His grace you will find perfect peace.
explanation: When we stop trying to control everything and trust completely in the Divine, we discover a peace that nothing can disturb.

english: God lives in everyone's heart and guides all beings.
explanation: The Divine presence in our own heart is always there to guide and comfort us. This inner connection is always available when we need it.

english: One who sees themselves in all beings and all beings in themselves reaches the highest.
explanation: This expanded awareness dissolves loneliness and separation. When we feel connected to all life, we naturally experience love and inner peace.

english: The soul is invisible, beyond thought, and never changes.
explanation: Our true nature is eternal consciousness that cannot be harmed by any external situation. This understanding brings fearlessness and strength.

sanskrit: जातस्य हि ध्रुवो मृत्युरध्रुवं जन्म मृतस्य च
english: For all who are born, death is certain. For all who die, birth is certain.
explanation: Accepting life's natural cycles helps us flow with changes instead of fighting them. This wisdom brings peace with life's transitions.

sanskrit: नैनं छिन्दन्ति शस्त्राणि नैनं दहति पावकः
english: The soul cannot be cut by weapons or burned by fire.
explanation: Our essential nature is indestructible and eternal. Knowing this gives us courage to face any challenge because our true self cannot be harmed.

english: Spiritual people work without attachment to purify themselves.
explanation: Any work can become spiritual practice when done with the right attitude. This transforms daily activities into opportunities for inner growth.

sanskrit: न मे पार्थास्ति कर्तव्यं त्रिषु लोकेषु किञ्चन
english: I have no work I must do in all the worlds, yet I work.
explanation: Even God works not from need but from love and duty. This teaches us to act from service and love rather than force or necessity.

english: By giving to others, you will prosper and get what you need.
explanation: When we give our time, energy, and resources selflessly, we create abundance in our own lives through the natural law of giving and receiving.

sanskrit: अनाश्रितः कर्मफलं कार्यं कर्म करोति यः
english: One who works without caring about rewards is a true renunciant.
explanation: Real spiritual life isn't about giving up work but giving up attachment to results. This attitude makes any lifestyle into a spiritual path.

english: One who stays the same in praise and criticism, content with whatever comes, is dear to Me.
explanation: Freedom from needing others' approval brings great peace. When our happiness doesn't depend on what people say about us, we find true contentment.

sanskrit: द्वौ भूतसर्गौ लोकेऽस्मिन्दैव आसुर एव च
english: There are two types of people in this world: divine and demonic.
explanation: We can choose to develop divine qualities like kindness and truth, or negative qualities like anger and greed. Each day we make this choice.

english: Fearlessness, purity of heart, and spiritual knowledge are divine qualities.
explanation: By developing these good qualities in our daily life, we naturally become stronger and more peaceful. These qualities light up our character.

english: Divine qualities lead to freedom, while demonic qualities lead to bondage.
explanation: Our mental qualities determine whether we feel free or trapped. By choosing thoughts and actions based on love and truth, we move toward freedom.

english: One who finds joy within themselves and is satisfied with their inner self is truly happy.
explanation: The greatest happiness comes from inner contentment rather than external success. Self-satisfaction based on spiritual connection brings lasting joy.

english: Those who are free from desire and anger, with controlled minds, reach the divine state.
explanation: Controlling desire and anger are the keys to spiritual realization. These two emotions create the most suffering, and mastering them brings divine peace.

english: You should also work for the welfare of the world.
explanation: Personal spiritual growth is connected to helping others. When we work for everyone's benefit, our own spiritual development naturally happens faster.

english: Good people who take only what they need are freed from all sins.
explanation: Taking only what we need and sharing the rest creates spiritual purification. This simple principle brings both material sufficiency and spiritual growth.

english: To protect good people and destroy evil, I appear age after age.
explanation: The force of good ultimately wins in the universe. This cosmic law gives us confidence that our positive efforts are supported by divine power.

sanskrit: अहं सर्वस्य प्रभवो मत्तः सर्वं प्रवर्तते
english: I am the source of everything; all things come from Me.
explanation: Understanding that everything comes from one divine source brings perspective to our problems. This vision of unity dissolves barriers and brings peace.
